metadata.description: Collects Amazing Adventures (1970) #5-10 and Avengers (1963) #95. Black Bolt, monarch of the Inhumans, wanders the streets of San Francisco -- his memory stolen and his identity forgotten  -- while Maximus the Mad has usurped the throne!  When he's targeted by criminals, revolutionaries and the mutant called Magneto, will his fellow Inhumans find him in time?  Guest-starring Thor and the Avengers!
metadata.name: Black Bolt: Something Inhuman This Way Comes
